headline: Zeta Global, The Trade Desk, Wix, Salesforce, and Workday Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after fears of disruption from artificial intelligence spooked investors, leading to a broad-based sell-off.

headline: Three Link Solutions Joins the Workday Innovation Partner Program
summary: DALLAS, February 03, 2026--Three Link Solutions (Three Link), an innovation company building high-impact technology-enabled solutions for Workday customers, today announced it has become an Innovation Partner, deepening its collaboration with Workday.

headline: Exploring US High Growth Tech Stocks This February 2026
summary: As February 2026 begins, the United States stock market has shown a strong start with major indices like the Dow Jones Industrial Average and S&P 500 posting significant gains, reflecting positive investor sentiment despite ongoing economic uncertainties such as delayed jobs data due to a government shutdown. In this environment, identifying high growth tech stocks requires careful consideration of factors such as innovation potential and resilience in adapting to evolving market dynamics.

headline: Argano Expands Cloud Transformation Capabilities with Acquisition of Stormloop Technologies
summary: PLANO, Texas, February 03, 2026--Argano, the world’s first and largest Global Specialist Consultancy exclusively focused on the design and delivery of High-Performance Business Operations with an AI-forward approach to transformation, today announced the acquisition of Stormloop Technologies ("Stormloop"), a fast-growing Workday partner that excels in delivering full suite advisory, post-implementation managed services, and follow on Phase X implementations across Human Capital Management (HCM)

headline: Workday Introduces the Military Skills Mapper to Help Organizations Better Recognize and Hire Veteran Talent
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the enterprise AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, today announced the Military Skills Mapper, a new feature in Workday Recruiting designed to help organizations more effectively identify and hire military veterans. By translating a veteran's military background into civilian-equivalent skills, the Military Skills Mapper will enable employers to better understand the leadership, technical expertise, and operational discipline service members bring to

headline: Workday Announces Date of Fiscal 2026 Fourth Quarter and Full Year Financial Results on February 24th, 2026
summary: Workday, Inc. (NASDAQ: WDAY), the enterprise AI platform for managing people, money, and agents, will announce its fiscal 2026 fourth quarter and full year financial results after market close on Tuesday, February 24, 2026. The company will host a conference call at 1:30 p.m. Pacific Time / 4:30 p.m. Eastern Time to review its financial results and business outlook.

headline: High Growth Tech Stocks to Watch in the US Market

headline: Scrumconnect expands Workday partnership to include implementation services
summary: Scrumconnect, the award-winning digital transformation company, today announced it has signed a partnership agreement with Workday, a leading provider of solutions to help organizations manage their people and money. This agreement expands Scrumconnect's existing Workday Application Management Services partnership, announced in 2025, to include full Workday implementation services. Together, the two partnerships allow Scrumconnect to support organisations across the full Workday lifecycle, from
